name: ATK Up Y
description: Increases ATK by 40% and CRIT DMG by 90%, but decreases CRIT RATE by 20%.

name: Amplification
description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 100% and SKILL DMG and DMG AMP by 25%. Additional grants the user 1 extra TURN.

name: Caffeine Overload
description: Grants the user 2 extra TURNS and SKILL POINTS and increases EVA by 15, but decreases MAX HP and DEF by 30% and RES and CRIT RATE by 10% and gives you 15% VULN.

name: Arts Up B
description: Increases ARTS by 30% and RES and SKILL DMG by 5%.

name: Chill
description: Increases DEF by 15%, ARTS by 20%, RES by 5%, and INTEL by 25.

name: Protection Y
description: Increases MAX HP by 20%, DEF by 40%, and RES by 5%.

name: Arts Up Y
description: Increases ARTS by 45%, RES by 10%, and SKILL DMG by 15%.

name: Honey Goodness
description: Increases ARTS by 30%, RES by 15%, and BASIC DMG by 50%.

name: Matchalicious
description: Increases MAX HP, ATK, and ARTS by 5% and INTEL by 5.

name: Impenetrable Barrier
description: Increases DEF by 300%, RES by 89%, and BASIC DMG by 100%.

name: Protection A
description: Increases MAX HP by 5% and DEF by 15%.

name: ATK Up A
description: Increases ATK by 10% and CRIT RATE by 20%.

name: Restoration Y
description: Heals 5% of MAX HP and increases MAX HP by 10%.

name: Arts Up A
description: Increases ARTS by 15% and RES by 3%.

name: Restoration B
description: Heals 25% of MAX HP.

name: Orange Scent
description: Increases ARTS, BASIC DMG, SKILL DMG, and DMG AMP by 10%. but increases VULN by 5%.

name: ATK Up B
description: Increases ATK by 25% and CRIT RATE by 30%.

name: Protection B
description: Increases MAX HP by 10% and DEF by 25%.

name: Comfort
description: Increases MAX HP by 100% and WEAK by 30%.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Increases ATK by 20%, CRIT DMG by 40%, EVA by 10, but decreases INTEL by 10.

name: Resurgence
description: Grants the the player 1 extra TURN and increases INTEL by 80.

name: Restoration A
description: Heals 15% of MAX HP.

name: Land of Dreams
description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 20%, and DMG AMP by 15%.

name: Leafy Green
description: Increases CRIT RATE by 30% and CRIT DMG by 50%.

name: Berry Blast
description: Increases ATK by 40% and SKILL DMG by 10%, but decreases DEF by 20% and RES by 5%.

name: Explorangsion
description: Increases ATK and CRIT RATE by 100%, but increases VULN by 5%.

name: Apple Core
description: Increases MAX HP by 10% and heals 2% of MAX HP every turn.

name: Pear Stem
description: Decreases starting SKILL POINTS by 1, but CRIT RATE and CRIT DMG by 20%.

name: Strawberry Seed
description: Increases DEF by 40% and SKILL DMG by 5%, but decreases ATK by 15%.

name: Grapevine
description: Grants 2 extra TURNS and increases of 20 intellect, but decreases MAX HP by 30% and increase VULN by 20%.

name: Dekopeel
description: Decreases MAX HP by 40%, but restores 15% of MAX HP every turn and increases DEF by 25% and RES by 5%.

name: Dried Mango
description: Decreases MAX HP by 51%, but increases ATK by 75%.

name: Pineapple Crown
description: Increases MAX HP, CRIT RATE, and DMG AMP by 15%. Consumes 4% of MAX HP every turn.

name: Durian Thorn
description: Increases DEF and ARTS by 50%, but consumes 5% of MAX HP every turn.

name: Apple a Day keeps the Doctor Away
description: Heals a portion of MAX HP every turn.

name: Crispy
description: Increases CRIT DMG every turn.

name: Seedless
description: Loses DEF for every attack.

name: Grape Burst
description: Every couple attacks gets another TURN.

name: Imposter
description: Copies enemy's base stats.

name: Rage
description: If HP is lowered below 50% ATK is increased every turn.

name: Thorns
description: Every attack inflicts the enemy with a DoT effect.

name: Berserk
description: Increases ATK based on damage taken.

name: Shell
description: ATK and DEF increases every turn.

name: Attack Down
description: Decrease ATK by 10%.

name: Arts Down
description: Decrease ARTS by 10%.

name: Crit Damage Down
description: Decrease CRIT DMG by 10%.

name: Crit Rate Down
description: Decrease CRIT RATE by 10%.

name: Defense Down
description: Decrease DEF by 10%.

name: Resistance Down
description: Decrease RES by 10%.

name: Attack Damage Down
description: Decreases BASIC DMG and SKILL DMG by 5%.

name: Damage Amplification Down
description: Decreases DMG AMP by 10%.

name: Weakness Up
description: Increases WEAK by 10%.

name: Vulnerability Up
description: Increases VULN by 10%.

name: Sting
description: This effect deals a base amount of damage to you at the end of your turn.

name: Bleed
description: This effect deals a percent amount of damage to you at the end of your turn.
